tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr Kline is the reason I now like Art history. He\'s one of those people who is really good at telling stories which is really important in a class like this. He is incredible at teaching and he\'s hilarious too. I wish I could take him again. Lecture wasn\'t always necessary to attend but I went anyways, because I never wanted to miss out on one.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Kline is one of the best art history professors I have encountered so far ( I have taken 4 art history courses in total). Not only is he extremely knowledgeable in his field, but his passion and enthusiasm makes the class environment interesting and intriguing. Can be a hard grader, but it is all worth it.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Professor Kline was AMAZING. His lectures are fascinating and you will LOVE art history by the end. Three exams, which you NEED TO STUDY FOR. FLASHCARDS ARE YOUR FRIENDS. Field trip to the MET with a paper. His class is great, can\'t wait to have him again for the next art history! Take him if you need art history!!!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Kline will ruin you for all future lecture-based classes. He gives THE most captivating, fascinating lectures; absolutely riveting. Loves what he teaches, and it shows tenfold. Three tests and a paper. He\'s a VERY hard grader, but his class is so interesting it doesn\'t even matter.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: I love him! Really hard to get nice grade, but you can really learn a lot from him. His brain is like Sherlock Holmes in the field of art history, you do need to spend some time to figure out what he really means on class, and also you need to spend even more time on reading and digesting.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Extremely smart. Anything in the book and in class is fair game for the test, so as long as you keep track of that you can study ahead. Otherwise he doesn\'t post images to study until a week before the test. It\'s a lot to study but if you work hard you can get an A. Tough grader, but there\'s no hw (1 paper) and you almost don\'t need the book at all

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Kline is very funny, engaging and definitely knows his stuff. His tests are hard kind of hard, but if you study, they aren\'t impossible.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Kline is an amazing professor. He has a unique way of teaching and really get\'s you into the material. Definitely take him especially if you\'re an art history major! You can NOT slack in his class but he is totally worth it. And a total cutie!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr kline is one of the most intelligent professors ive had for art history thus far. Aside from knowing everything about every period, style, and artist, his insight is astonishing and to be perfectly honest, inspiring. Be warned though, he has very high expectations. Think outside the box with papers and participation. He respects that the most.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Yes, he is engaging, and that does help learning, but do not take him lightly. He expects superior writing for capstone. His laid back approach to teaching has a purpose, but your approach has to be intense to ace the course. Slow to return assignments, so sometimes you don\'t know if you are on course.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I like Kline, I do. And maybe it\'s just me, but I find it next to impossible to receive an A in this man\'s class. Awesome atmosphere and you will learn a ton, but if you plan on continuing school after undergraduate, be prepared to have the GPA tank a little. And by that I mean a B. Or C.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I recommend him for capstone although I had him for High Renaissance and he was just as awesome. Very approachable, talented teacher, knows everything and can make anything interesting. Capstone with him was my easiest Art History class by far. It seems that he recycles lectures from his other classes to use in capstone.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I switched into class late, but I quickly caught up, you really have to pay attention and reflect on what he says in class and put it all together in your head to get the gist of the class. He is a very amusing and silly person, which brings life to the class, lots of reading assignments, challenging tests, but paying attention and study all text!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He\'s extremely engaging and knowledgeable about the world of art history. He knows so much info it\'s impossible not to learn something if you go. Attendance isn\'t completely mandatory but he does keep track. Tests are super hard but if you go and study you be able to pull at least a B or C. He\'s also kind of goofy.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He teaches in a way that engages you and helps you remember the content. He relates things in a silly way so it sticks in your mind. Good sense of humor so even if you have class first thing in the morning, he keeps you away. Tests are very hard though, so study your butt off!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Kline is a fantastic teacher. Lectures are engaging and entertaining, he encourages discussion and makes sure that you learn a lot. Slide quizzes are easy but he expects high quality on the essay tests and paper.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: If you are not an art major DO NOT take this class its too serious for a non art major. you have to go to 2 mandatory trips to museums on a sunday to NY and philadelphia. tests are to remember 50 images ,date, period , title, place, and significance. top 10 of my worst classes in my college career and i am a senior in engineering

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (4)  Tough Grader (2)  Respected (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Very intresting class, he has a very unique way of teaching, that is unlike most art history classes. He will help you a lot if you ask. Very laid back class, tests are a little hard but not impossible.
